project_id.description: The GCP project ID for the project containing the target Pubsub Subscription.
project_id.title: Project ID

subscription_id.description: The Pubsub Subscription ID that should be used to poll for messages.
subscription_id.title: Pubsub Subscription ID

credentials_json.description: The contents of the JSON service account key. Check out the docs if you need help generating this key.
credentials_json.title: Service Account Key JSON

bicycle_consumer_threads.title: Bicycle Consumer Threads
bicycle_consumer_threads.description: The number of Kafka Consumer Threads to create.

max_number_of_messages.description: Max number of messages consumer will pull per request
max_number_of_messages.title: Max Number Of Messages

max_inbound_message_size.description: Maximum inbound message size for the consumer
max_inbound_message_size.title: Maximum Inbound Message Size
